SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IPetriNet

All Known Implementing Classes:
PetriNet
public interface IPetriNet
IPetriNet defines the interface for a Petri net, outlining methods for adding,removing, and retrieving places, transitions, and arcs within the net.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArcDrain
    addArcDrain(int w, Place p, Transition t)
    Adds a new ArcDrain (special Place to Transition arc that drains tokens) to the Petri net.

    addArcPT(int w, Place p, Transition t)
    Adds a new ArcPT (Place to Transition arc) to the Petri net.

    Adds a new ArcTP (Transition to Place arc) to the Petri net.
    ArcZero
    addArcZero(int w, Place p, Transition t)
    Adds a new ArcZero (special Place to Transition arc requiring zero tokens) to the Petri net.

    Adds a new Place to the Petri net with a specified initial token count.

  • Method Details

    • getPlaces

      ArrayList<Place> getPlaces()
      Retrieves all Places in the Petri net.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Place objects.

    • getArcsTP

      ArrayList<ArcTP> getArcsTP()
      Retrieves all ArcTP (Transition to Place arcs) in the Petri net.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ArcTP objects.

    • getArcsPT

      ArrayList<ArcPT> getArcsPT()
      Retrieves all ArcPT (Place to Transition arcs) in the Petri net.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ArcPT objects.

      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ArcDrain objects.

    • getTransitions

      ArrayList<Transition> getTransitions()
      Retrieves all Transitions in the Petri net.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Transition objects.

    • addPlace

      Place addPlace(int tokens) throws NegativeException
      Adds a new Place to the Petri net with a specified initial token count.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The initial token count for the new Place.
      Returns:
      The created Place object.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the token count is negative.

    • addArcTP

      ArcTP addArcTP(int w, Place p, Transition t) throws NegativeException, MissingPlaceException, MissingTransitionException, DuplicateArcException
      Adds a new ArcTP (Transition to Place arc) to the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      w - The weight of the arc.
      p - The Place connected by the arc.
      t - The Transition connected by the arc.
      Returns:
      The created ArcTP object.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the weight is negative.
      MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place does not exist.
      MissingTransitionException - If the specified Transition does not exist.
      DuplicateArcException - If an identical arc already exists.

    • addArcPT

      ArcPT addArcPT(int w, Place p, Transition t) throws NegativeException, MissingPlaceException, MissingTransitionException, DuplicateArcException
      Adds a new ArcPT (Place to Transition arc) to the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      w - The weight of the arc.
      p - The Place connected by the arc.
      t - The Transition connected by the arc.
      Returns:
      The created ArcPT object.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the weight is negative.
      MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place does not exist.
      MissingTransitionException - If the specified Transition does not exist.
      DuplicateArcException - If an identical arc already exists.

    • addArcZero

      ArcZero addArcZero(int w, Place p, Transition t) throws NegativeException, MissingPlaceException, MissingTransitionException, DuplicateArcException
      Adds a new ArcZero (special Place to Transition arc requiring zero tokens) to the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      w - The weight of the arc.
      p - The Place connected by the arc.
      t - The Transition connected by the arc.
      Returns:

      DuplicateArcException - If an identical arc already exists.

    • addArcDrain

      ArcDrain addArcDrain(int w, Place p, Transition t) throws NegativeException, MissingPlaceException, MissingTransitionException, DuplicateArcException
      Adds a new ArcDrain (special Place to Transition arc that drains tokens) to the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      w - The weight of the arc.
      p - The Place connected by the arc.
      t - The Transition connected by the arc.
      Returns:
      The created ArcDrain object.
      Throws:
      NegativeException - If the weight is negative.
      MissingPlaceException - If the specified Place does not exist.
      MissingTransitionException - If the specified Transition does not exist.
      DuplicateArcException - If an identical arc already exists.

    • addTransition

      Transition addTransition()
      Adds a new Transition to the Petri net.
      Returns:
      The created Transition object.

    • removePlace

      void removePlace(Place p) throws MissingPlaceException, MissingArcException
      Removes a specified Place from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      p - The Place to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingPlaceException - If the Place does not exist in the net.
      MissingArcException - Remnant from removal of all Arcs linked to the Place. By construction it shouldn't be called.

    • removeArcTP

      void removeArcTP(ArcTP a) throws MissingArcException
      Removes a specified ArcTP (Transition to Place arc) from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      a - The ArcTP to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingArcException - If the arc does not exist in the net.

    • removeArcPT

      void removeArcPT(ArcPT a) throws MissingArcException
      Removes a specified ArcPT (Place to Transition arc) from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      a - The ArcPT to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingArcException - If the arc does not exist in the net.

    • removeArcZero

      void removeArcZero(ArcZero a) throws MissingArcException
      Removes a specified ArcZero from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      a - The ArcZero to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingArcException - If the arc does not exist in the net.

    • removeArcDrain

      void removeArcDrain(ArcDrain a) throws MissingArcException
      Removes a specified ArcDrain from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      a - The ArcDrain to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingArcException - If the arc does not exist in the net.

    • removeTransition

      void removeTransition(Transition t) throws MissingTransitionException
      Removes a specified Transition from the Petri net.
      Parameters:
      t - The Transition to remove.
      Throws:
      MissingTransitionException - If the Transition does not exist in the net.
